TextView.android:text: Have you ever had a blood transfusion ?
Have you had gonorrhea or other sexually transmitted diseases in the last 12 months?
Have you changed your sexual partner in the last 4 months ?
Had you stay of at least 6 months in the last 12 months in countries whose population is largely affected by the AIDS epidemic?
Have you ever had an organ transplant ?
Have you give birth for less than 6 months?
Have you had a fever or infection (cough, urinary tract infection, skin sores, etc.) in the last 2 weeks?
Have you had any surgery in the last 4 months ?
Have you undergone endoscopy (gastroscopic fibroscopy, colonoscopy, etc.) in the last 4 months ?
Have you had recent heart pains after an effort?
Have you had any tests and treatments done by the dentist or dental hygienist for less than 30 days ?
Have you been taking antibiotics for less than 2 weeks?
